content: The relationship between Lady-in-waitings and their respective queens or princesses was expected to be one of loyalty, service, and deference. Lady-in-waitings were expected to be constantly by the side of their queen or princess and attend to her every need. They were expected to be discreet, respectful, and obedient in their interactions with their superior. The relationship was also expected to be a supportive one, with Lady-in-waitings serving as confidants and companions to their queens or princesses. Overall, the relationship was one of mutual trust and respect, with the Lady-in-waiting serving as a trusted member of the royal household.
